con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="ExternalSalesManagerService" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/salesmanagement/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/salesmanagement/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns2="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http" xmlns:ns1="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/"> <wsdl:import location="http://localhost:8181/cxf/SalesManagement?wsdl=SalesManagement.wsdl" namespace="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/"></wsdl:import> <wsdl:binding name="ExternalSalesManagerServiceSoapBinding" type="ns1:SalesManagement"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="fetchProducingOrders"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="fetchProducingOrders"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="fetchProducingOrdersResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="makeOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="makeOrder"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="makeOrderResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="payOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="payOrder"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="payOrderResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="fetchCatalog"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="fetchCatalog"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="fetchCatalogResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="setOrderDelivered"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="setOrderDelivered"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="setOrderDeliveredResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="setOrderDelivering"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="setOrderDelivering"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="setOrderDeliveringResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="addItemCatalog"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="addItemCatalog"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="addItemCatalogResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="fetchOrderReference"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="fetchOrderReference"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="fetchOrderReferenceResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="cancelOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="cancelOrder"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="cancelOrderResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ExternalSalesManagerService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:ExternalSalesManagerServiceSoapBinding" name="ExternalSalesManagertPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8181/cxf/SalesManagement"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<wsdl:definitions name="SalesManagement" targetNamespace="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:ns1="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://salesmanagement.soa1.polytech.unice.fr/"> <xs:element name="addItemCatalog" type="tns:addItemCatalog"/> <xs:element name="addItemCatalogResponse" type="tns:addItemCatalogResponse"/> <xs:element name="cancelOrder" type="tns:cancelOrder"/> <xs:element name="cancelOrderResponse" type="tns:cancelOrderResponse"/> <xs:element name="fetchCatalog" type="tns:fetchCatalog"/> <xs:element name="fetchCatalogResponse" type="tns:fetchCatalogResponse"/> <xs:element name="fetchOrderReference" type="tns:fetchOrderReference"/> <xs:element name="fetchOrderReferenceResponse" type="tns:fetchOrderReferenceResponse"/> <xs:element name="fetchProducingOrders" type="tns:fetchProducingOrders"/> <xs:element name="fetchProducingOrdersResponse" type="tns:fetchProducingOrdersResponse"/> <xs:element name="makeOrder" type="tns:makeOrder"/> <xs:element name="makeOrderResponse" type="tns:makeOrderResponse"/> <xs:element name="payOrder" type="tns:payOrder"/> <xs:element name="payOrderResponse" type="tns:payOrderResponse"/> <xs:element name="setOrderDelivered" type="tns:setOrderDelivered"/> <xs:element name="setOrderDeliveredResponse" type="tns:setOrderDeliveredResponse"/> <xs:element name="setOrderDelivering" type="tns:setOrderDelivering"/> <xs:element name="setOrderDeliveringResponse" type="tns:setOrderDeliveringResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="fetchProducingOrders"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="fetchProducingOrdersResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="producing_order" type="tns:orderRequest"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderRequest"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="address" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="order_item" type="tns:orderItem"/> <xs:element name="order_id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderItem"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="option" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="product_id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="qty" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="makeOrder"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="order_request" type="tns:orderRequest"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="makeOrderResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="order_reference" type="tns:orderReference"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="orderReference"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="estimated_delivery" type="xs:dateTime"/> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="order_status" type="tns:orderStatus"/> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:double"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="payOrder"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="order_id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="payment_info" type="tns:paymentInfo"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="payment_plan" type="tns:paymentPlan"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="paymentInfo"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="card_expire" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="card_number" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="csc" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="payOrderResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="payment_reference" type="tns:paymentResponse"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="paymentResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="message" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="success" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="fetchCatalog"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="fetchCatalogResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="catalog" type="tns:catalog"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="catalog"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="product" type="tns:product"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="product"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="collection" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="id" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="image_link" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:double"/> <xs:element name="product_type" type="tns:productType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="setOrderDelivered"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="order_id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="setOrderDeliveredResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="setOrderDelivering"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="order_id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="setOrderDeliveringResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="addItemCatalog"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="new_product" type="tns:product"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="addItemCatalogResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="product_id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="fetchOrderReference"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="order_id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="fetchOrderReferenceResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="order_reference" type="tns:orderReference"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="cancelOrder"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="order_id" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="cancelOrderResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="status" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="orderStatus"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="REGISTERED"/> <xs:enumeration value="PRODUCING"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELIVERING"/> <xs:enumeration value="DELIVERED"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="paymentPlan"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DIRECT"/> <xs:enumeration value="SHORT"/> <xs:enumeration value="LONG"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="productType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="CHAIR"/> <xs:enumeration value="TABLE"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="payOrderResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:payOrderResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="setOrderDeliveringResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:setOrderDeliveringResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="payOrder"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:payOrder" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="fetchCatalog"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:fetchCatalog" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="setOrderDelivering"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:setOrderDelivering" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="cancelOrderResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:cancelOrderResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addItemCatalogResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:addItemCatalogResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="setOrderDeliveredResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:setOrderDeliveredResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="cancelOrder"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:cancelOrder" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="fetchProducingOrders"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:fetchProducingOrders" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="makeOrder"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:makeOrder" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="setOrderDelivered"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:setOrderDelivered" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="fetchOrderReferenceResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:fetchOrderReferenceResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="makeOrderResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:makeOrderResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="fetchCatalogResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:fetchCatalogResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="addItemCatalog"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:addItemCatalog" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="fetchOrderReference"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:fetchOrderReference" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="fetchProducingOrdersResponse"> <wsdl:part element="ns1:fetchProducingOrdersResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="SalesManagement"> <wsdl:operation name="fetchProducingOrders"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:fetchProducingOrders" name="fetchProducingOrders"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:fetchProducingOrdersResponse" name="fetchProducingOrdersResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="makeOrder"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:makeOrder" name="makeOrder"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:makeOrderResponse" name="makeOrderResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="payOrder"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:payOrder" name="payOrder"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:payOrderResponse" name="payOrderResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="fetchCatalog"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:fetchCatalog" name="fetchCatalog"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:fetchCatalogResponse" name="fetchCatalogResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="setOrderDelivered"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:setOrderDelivered" name="setOrderDelivered"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:setOrderDeliveredResponse" name="setOrderDeliveredResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="setOrderDelivering"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:setOrderDelivering" name="setOrderDelivering"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:setOrderDeliveringResponse" name="setOrderDeliveringResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="addItemCatalog"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:addItemCatalog" name="addItemCatalog"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:addItemCatalogResponse" name="addItemCatalogResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="fetchOrderReference"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:fetchOrderReference" name="fetchOrderReference"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:fetchOrderReferenceResponse" name="fetchOrderReferenceResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="cancelOrder"> <wsdl:input message="ns1:cancelOrder" name="cancelOrder"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="ns1:cancelOrderResponse" name="cancelOrderResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> </wsdl:definitions>
